text.intro: Twitterverse of Belgrade anti-government protests against media censorship, political violence and rising autocracy in Serbia. There are 2909 nodes and 6889 edges. The network consists of tweets containing the hashtag #1od5miliona, posted between January 10, 4:34 PM,  and January 13, 10:15 AM. Two nodes are linked if one user retweets another user's tweet. The network suggests a clear polarization between pro- and anti-regime communities.
text.title: Anti-government protests in Belgrade: #1od5miliona
